function_description: Moving a card to a different list
initial_state: User is logged into 4ga Boards and viewing a board with multiple lists and at least one card present.
steps: Locate the card you want to move.
Click and hold the card to drag it.
Drag the card to the desired list (open or hidden).
Release the card to drop it in the target list.
expected_state: The card is moved from its original list to the bottom of the target list.
